title: President felicitates newly elected Iranian President
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 20 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Sunday felicitated newly elected President of Iran Syed Ibrahim Raisi on his victory in the Presidential Elections.
In a letter of felicitation, the president said that Iranian people had affirmed their trust in his leadership for peace, stability and prosperity.
President Dr. Arif Alvi wishes for peace, stability and prosperity to Iranian people and expresses hope for further strengthening ties between Pakistan and Iran in his congratulatory letter to the newly elected Iranian President, Syed Ibrahim Raisi. pic.twitter.com/gFzcB6rm5V
— The President of Pakistan (@PresOfPakistan) June 20, 2021
He said under President Raisi’s leadership, the fraternal ties between Iran and Pakistan would be further strengthened.
The president also expressed his best wishes to the newly elected president and the Iranian people.
